mapper.sql: o_id, o_number, o_name, o_state, o_phone, o_jdata, o_carder, o_ownership, o_before, o_remarks
mapper.update: UPDATE owner SET o_name = #{oname},o_phone = #{ophone}, o_carder = #{ocarder},o_ownership = #{ownership},o_before =#{obefore},o_remarks = #{oremarks} WHERE o_number = #{onumber} ;
mapper.select:
SELECT oo.* ,l.* FROM (SELECT o.o_name,o.o_number,re.h_number,o.o_jdata,o.o_before,o.o_phone,o.o_remarks,o.o_ownership,o.o_carder,re.Re_date,re.Re_price,re.Re_fkfs FROM OWNER o LEFT JOIN real_estate re ON o.o_number=re.o_number) oo LEFT JOIN lease l ON oo.o_number=l.o_number WHERE 1=1
AND oo.o_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{o_name}),'%')
AND oo.h_number LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{h_number}),'%')
